Title: The Enchanting Shadow
Writer: Songling Pu (story "Nie Xiaoqian in book "Liaozhai Zhiyi""), Yue-Ting Wang
Actors: Betty Loh Ti, Lei Zhao, Rhoqing Tang, Chih-Ching Yang
Plot: A young scholar spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He doesn't believe in the rumors, but after running into a Taoist swordsman, he meets a beautiful lady ghost.
